5254.verse: And conceal your speech or publicize it; indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

5255.verse: Does He who created not know, while He is the Subtle, the Acquainted?

5256.verse: It is He who made the earth tame for you - so walk among its slopes and eat of His provision - and to Him is the resurrection.

5257.verse: Do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not cause the earth to swallow you and suddenly it would sway?

5258.verse: Or do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not send against you a storm of stones? Then you would know how [severe] was My warning.

5259.verse: And already had those before them denied, and how [terrible] was My reproach.

5260.verse: Do they not see the birds above them with wings outspread and [sometimes] folded in? None holds them [aloft] except the Most Merciful. Indeed He is, of all things, Seeing.

5261.verse: Or who is it that could be an army for you to aid you other than the Most Merciful? The disbelievers are not but in delusion.

5262.verse: Or who is it that could provide for you if He withheld His provision? But they have persisted in insolence and aversion.

5263.verse: Then is one who walks fallen on his face better guided or one who walks erect on a straight path?

5264.verse: Say, "It is He who has produced you and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful."

5265.verse: Say, "It is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered."

5266.verse: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"

5267.verse: Say, "The knowledge is only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner."
